name: ArrowMasterFlyingFestPC
description:
Control the flight of the arrow! Become the master of flying arrows! 

In this game, you need to control the flight of an arrow, reach the target and destroy the golden king! Collect coins that you can spend on new cool arrows!

Increase your earnings for hitting the soldiers of the king!

In the game you will find countless unique levels! And how far can you get?

Test your dexterity and attentiveness avoiding obstacles! Both static and moving!

Pass new levels, improve your arrows, increase income for hits and all this in the free game Arrow Master Flying Fest!
